alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Toombs and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Center, or 7 miles southwest of Lyons, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Uvalda, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, South Thompson, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing and Johnson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
